CustomField.formula: (IF(ISNULL(SIM_Rental_Fee__c) , 0, SIM_Rental_Fee__c) + IF(ISNULL(Monthly_Managed_Services_Terminal_Fee__c) , 0, Monthly_Managed_Services_Terminal_Fee__c) + IF(ISNULL(Monthly_Terminal_Rental_Fee__c) , 0, Monthly_Terminal_Rental_Fee__c) + IF(ISNULL(Monthly_Terminal_Service_Support_Fee__c) , 0, Monthly_Terminal_Service_Support_Fee__c) + IF(ISNULL( Monthly_Gateway_Per_Terminal_Fee__c ) , 0, Monthly_Gateway_Per_Terminal_Fee__c )) * 12 * Quantity__c
CustomField.label: Annualized Recurring Fees
